meanings.definition: The quality or state of being cloddish.
meanings.sent1: His cloddishnesses were evident in his clumsy movements.
meanings.sent2: The cloddishnesses of the farmer were apparent in his rough manners.
meanings.sent3: Despite his cloddishnesses, he always managed to make people smile with his jokes.
meanings.sent4: Her cloddishnesses were like a heavy cloak, weighing her down in social situations.
meanings.sent5: The cloddishnesses of the elephant made it stand out among the graceful gazelles.

meanings.definition: The behavior or characteristics of a clod.
meanings.sent1: The cloddishnesses of the bully made him unpopular among his peers.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stand his cloddishnesses, always making a mess wherever he went.
meanings.sent3: His cloddishnesses at the party led to some hilarious mishaps.
meanings.sent4: The cloddishnesses of the old car reminded him of a stubborn mule.
meanings.sent5: The cloddishnesses of the toddler were endearing to everyone around.

meanings.definition: The awkward or unrefined nature of someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The cloddishnesses of his speech made it hard for others to take him seriously.
meanings.sent2: She tried to hide her cloddishnesses during the fancy dinner party.
meanings.sent3: His cloddishnesses in dancing were a source of amusement for the guests.
meanings.sent4: The cloddishnesses of the robot's movements were a stark contrast to its sleek design.
meanings.sent5: The cloddishnesses of the painting gave it a unique charm that appealed to many.
